original: WHEREAS, the Trust is engaged in business as an open-end investment company registered under the Investment Company Act of 1940, as amended, and consists of one or more series; and WHEREAS, the Trust desires to enter into this Agreement with respect to its current and future series; and WHEREAS, the Trust wishes to engage Domini to provide certain oversight, administrative and management services, and Domini is willing to provide such oversight, administrative and management services to the Trust on the terms and conditions hereinafter set forth; NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the mutual covenants and agreements of the parties hereto as herein set forth, the parties covenant and agree as follows:
ollama_generated:
WHEREAS, the Trust operates as a registered open-end investment company under the Investment Company Act of 1940, as amended, and comprises one or more series; and WHEREAS, the Trust seeks to establish this Agreement with regard to its existing and future series; and WHEREAS, the Trust finds it advantageous to retain Domini for certain oversight, administrative, and management services, and Domini consents to perform such oversight, administrative, and management duties on the terms and conditions hereinafter specified; NOW, THEREFORE, in exchange for the mutual commitments and undertakings of the parties as detailed below, the parties agree as follows:

In this revised clause, the Trust has been changed from seeking to "enter into" the agreement to finding it "advantageous to retain" Domini. This slight change subtly communicates that the decision to hire Domini is the Trust's choice rather than a contractual obligation.

original: IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have caused this Agreement to be executed and delivered in their names and on their behalf by the undersigned, thereunto duly authorized, all as of the day and year first above written. The undersigned Trustee of the Trust has executed this Agreement not individually but as a Trustee under the Trust's Declaration of Trust, dated October 6, 2004, as amended, and the obligations of this Agreement are not binding upon any of the Trustees or shareholders of the Trust individually but bind only the Trust estate.
ollama_generated:
IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties involved have executed and delivered this Agreement in their respective capacities, on the date and year first above written. This Agreement is binding upon the Trust, rather than any individual Trustee or shareholder, as the obligations of this Agreement are not personally binding upon them but solely upon the Trust estate, which they represent under the Declaration of Trust, dated October 6, 2004, as amended.

In essence, the Trustees and shareholders are acting in their roles as representatives of the Trust, and any obligations arising from this Agreement will be fulfilled by the Trust estate itself.
